document_data.name: Firethorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Firethorn''', or '''Sea Rose''', was a naturally occurring plant on the [[Island of Firethorns]] within the [[Genie's Turban]] off the coast of mainland [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: The presence of firethorn gave the Island of the Firethorns a lovely red coloration. Though beautiful, the firethorn plant's thorns carried a dangerous [[poison]], creating a natural barrier that surrounded most of the lower portions of the island since the plants grew so close together. Firethorn plants also gave off natural heat and glowed softly.
